description: The same VQ35DE as the 350Z, wrapped in leather and luxury. The G35 shares its platform with Nissan's Z-car but adds weight, refinement, and the kind of anonymity that makes it the perfect sleeper. Nobody expects the luxury sedan to keep up — until it does.
lore: The G35 is the car you buy when you want 350Z performance with grown-up manners. It's the car that shows up to meets in a suit and tie, then quietly runs mid-13s at the strip. Half the G35s in Nova Pacifica are secretly faster than they look — and that's exactly the point.
